Key Match Events: Myles Turner recorded his seventh career game with 30+ points and 10+ rebounds
Luka Doncic recorded his first game with 10+ assists on the season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indiana is now 3-1 in Dallas underneath Rick Carlisle since returning in 2021
Indiana has won five of the last six meetings in Dallas
Others: Tyrese Haliburton has extended his double-double streak to four games
T.J. McConnell has scored 10+ points in four of his last five games
